name: Synchronoise
description: You emit a strange soundwave that only damages creature that share a type with you. Any creature within a 40 foot circle that shares at least one of your types must make a CON save against your Move DC, taking 2d10 + MOVE psychic damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works well if it is the same type as the move used by the last Pokemon.
